languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Assassin gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against that enemy until the end of the Assassin's next turn.
languages.original_text: Атакуя противника, обладающего полным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} получает +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} в бою с этим противником до конца своего следующего хода.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Assassin attacks an enemy that is at full wounds, the Assassin gains +20% dodge and dodge reduction against that enemy until the end of the Assassin's next turn.
Whenever the Assassin attacks an enemy that is at full wounds, the Assassin gains +20% dodge and dodge reduction against that enemy until the end of the Assassin's next turn.

languages.text: Атакуя противника, обладающего полным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} получает +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} в бою с этим противником до конца своего следующего хода.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Assassin gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against that enemy until the end of the Assassin's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Атакуя противника, обладающего полным запасом здоровья, ассасин получает +20% к уклонению и снижению уклонения в бою с этим противником до конца своего следующего хода.
Атакуя противника, обладающего полным запасом здоровья, ассасин получает +20% к уклонению и снижению уклонения в бою с этим противником до конца своего следующего хода.

languages.text: 每当刺客{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}攻击{/g}满{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的敌人时，对该名敌人都会获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}，效果持续至刺客的下个回合开始。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Assassin gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against that enemy until the end of the Assassin's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 每当刺客攻击满{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的敌人时，对该名敌人都会获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}，效果持续至刺客的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} ataque a un enemigo que tenga las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al máximo, gana un +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} contra ese enemigo hasta el final del próximo turno del asesino.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Assassin gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against that enemy until the end of the Assassin's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el asesino ataque a un enemigo que tenga las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al máximo, gana un +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} contra ese enemigo hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} einen Gegner angreift, der das Maximum an {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, erhält er +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} gegen diesen Gegner bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Assassinen.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Assassin gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against that enemy until the end of the Assassin's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Assassine einen Gegner angreift, der das Maximum an {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, erhält er +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduzierung{/g} gegen diesen Gegner bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Assassinen.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g} attaque un ennemi qui a déjà atteint le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum de sa réserve, il bénéficie de +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} contre cet ennemi jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Assassin gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against that enemy until the end of the Assassin's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'Assassin attaque un ennemi qui a déjà atteint le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum de sa réserve, il bénéficie de +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} contre cet ennemi jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が最大の敵を攻撃する時、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、その敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}が+20%される。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Assassin gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against that enemy until the end of the Assassin's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が最大の敵を攻撃する時、アサシンの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、その敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}が+20%される。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Suikastçı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı tam bir düşmana saldırdığında o düşmana karşı +%20 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, Suikastçı'nın bir sonraki turunun sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Assassin gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against that enemy until the end of the Assassin's next turn.
